name: Artillery Remote (V)
Lore: 'Although artillery weapons have a manual firing mechanism, this optional device allows weapons operation from a remote location. Uses coded signals.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. Your artillery weapons at same and related sites are Heroic and may be targeted by weapons like a vehicle (use armor = 4). May place this device in Used Pile to add 2 to a just drawn artillery weapon destiny.',
